"Twin Daggers":
"Twin Daggers are striking weapons that seamlessly merge offence and defence.

Although their attack range is short, they have excellent handling. They can easily chase enemies in the air and perform stunning aerial attacks.

<%WeaponActionText>: Perform a Spin."

"This explains the Twin Dagger Gear system.

When you learn the skill \"Twin Dagger Gear\", a Gear Gauge is added to the top of your Weapon Palette.

You can fill the Gear Gauge by jumping or Spinning."

"As the Gear Gauge fills, Photon Arts become more powerful and enemies have larger reactions to your attacks.

The Twin Dagger Gear Gauge does not decrease as long as you remain in the air, but instantly empties as soon as you land on the ground."
